Home » 40P18 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6)
28 Saraṇaduka, Mahantaradukādi
Saraṇaduka, Mahantaradukādi
95.
222Saraṇaṃ sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Araṇaṃ sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
223Hetuyā dve…pe…  aññamaññe ekaṃ…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
